item.title: Rigging The Game by Dan Nicholson (1/N)
item.description: Dan Nicholson’s Rigging the Game offers a unique perspective on how to achieve financial certainty in a world filled with unpredictability. The core idea? Many people choose to remain in the “certainty of misery” rather than face the “misery of uncertainty.” But are you one of those people? Nicholson invites us to reconsider how we approach decisions, especially in business and finance, and provides a set of principles designed to help us rig the game in our favor.
